app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2223-7747/10/3/550/s1. Table S1: Total phenolic and flavonoid content of methanolic extracts of selected Mentha sp.; Table S2: Phenolic composition (g/g) of selected Mentha species; Table S3: Chemical composition of the essential oils and headspace samples of selected Mentha species.
